definitions.definition: Of, pertaining to, or resembling , a tempest ; also, of a place : frequently experiencing tempests; (very) stormy .

Characterized by disorderly , frenetic , or violent activity ; stormy, tumultuous , turbulent ; also, of a person , their behaviour or nature , etc.: characterized by bouts of bad temper or sudden changes of mood ; impetuous , stormy, temperamental .
examples: After their tempestuous argument, they did not speak to each other for weeks.

main_definition: Of, pertaining to, or resembling , a tempest ; also, of a place : frequently experiencing tempests; (very) stormy .
secondary_definitions: ( figurative ) Characterized by disorderly , frenetic , or violent activity ; stormy, tumultuous , turbulent ; also, of a person , their behaviour or nature , etc.: characterized by bouts of bad temper or sudden changes of mood ; impetuous , stormy, temperamental .
